import React, {useState} from 'react' import './Tab.css'; import Menu from './Menu'; const GalleryReact = () => { const [items,setItems] = useState(Menu) const filterItem=(cateItem)=>{ } return ( <>

Order Our Favourite Dish

{ items.map((elem)=>{ const {id,name,image,description,price}=elem; return( <>

{name}

{description}

Price: {price}

prices may on delected date.

) } ) }
) } export default GalleryReact
